reviews.review: Not much needs to be said. It you have not already bought it, What are you doing?

Super Spiel!
Ich empfehle das Spiel sehr, da das Spiel sehr Story-Haltig ist und nicht nur ein normales Puzzle-Game. Es ist jetzt schon zu einer meiner Favorit-Games geworden und ich denke, dass das jeder mal gespielt haben muss!
Portal is easy to pick up and has a unique dark sense of humor.  I highly recommend this puzzle game.
One of the greatest of all time.
Lots of fun and makes you think!
Portal is such a great puzzle game, while not too complicated it does help relax and I love the story line.

A platform classic. A must play :)

Best Game(s) EVER!!!
Valve Please come out with a 3rd one!!!!
Good fun. Only takes a few hours to complete. Portal 2 is better.
Nothing like challenging your mind while being harrased by a sadistic AI.
It is very good game. Not strand type game.
p o r t a l

I played Portal on the Orange Box on the 360 years and years ago, and it still holds up. It is another one of those games that Valve periodically puts on sale for like 90% off, so definitely grab it if you get the chance. 10/10, great, of course.

El mejor juego del universo cero dudas y muchas pruebas besos rosa
Amazing physics engine, and great sound effects. 8/10
It's a very fun game as it has very good levels and its basically everyone's favourite puzzle game.
Great game! I last played it when I was in the fourth grade, and i'm about to play it again for the first time in years!
get the double pack please dude portal 2 is so much better designed

it was a great mix of a puzzle game and story, i highly recomend it.
